EmailTemplate.description: Quotation to be sent to the Customer
EmailTemplate.name: Quote
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Ground Support Solutions Quotation {!Case.Quote_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Ground Support Solutions. Your case tracking number for this inquiry is provided above. If you wish to communicate with us further about this inquiry, you may reply to this e-mail -- please leave the Reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses.
Dear
Please find attached Honeywell Ground Support Solutions quotation {!Case.Quote_Number__c} per your request. When you are ready to place your PO, please forward your order to aerogseorders@honeywell.com and reference your contract/agreement number if applicable.
Please advise if we can be of further assistance.
Best Regards,
Honeywell Aerospace Ground Support Solutions
